Bird Wars Roost
DashboardBattlesDevices

API Reference

Complete documentation for the Bird Wars async battle server API. All authenticated endpoints require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

Authentication

For endpoints marked with , include your secret token:

Authorization: Bearer <your-secret-token>
POST/api/registerPublic

Register a new Playdate device. Returns a one-time secret token that must be stored securely - it cannot be retrieved again. Can also be used to update profile (displayName, avatar) when authenticated.

Request Body

displayNamestringoptional— Optional display name for the device (max 100 chars)
avatarstringoptional— Bird avatar: BIRD1-BIRD12 (default: BIRD1)

Example:

{
  "displayName": "My Playdate",
  "avatar": "BIRD4"
}

Response

successboolean— Whether the registration was successful
deviceIdstring— Unique identifier for the device
secretTokenstring— Secret token for authentication (store securely!)
avatarstring— Selected bird avatar (BIRD1-BIRD12)
messagestring— Human-readable status message

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "deviceId": "a0dcb007051f88c0aef99bf01ffe224b...",
  "secretToken": "bvUKW9vBPZS8GHtCXe3k8jSm56BQDP...",
  "avatar": "BIRD4",
  "message": "Device registered successfully. Store this token securely - it cannot be retrieved again."
}

Error Responses

429Rate limit exceeded (max 10 registrations per minute)
500Server configuration error
GET/api/battlesPublic

List all public battles. Private battles are excluded from this listing.

Response

successboolean— Whether the request was successful
battlesBattle[]— Array of public battle objects

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "battles": [
    {
      "battleId": "e0a5b571c0ddc493",
      "player1DeviceId": "a0dcb007...",
      "player2DeviceId": null,
      "status": "pending",
      "currentTurn": 0,
      "isPrivate": false
    }
  ]
}
POST/api/battlesAuth Required

Create a new battle session. The authenticated device becomes player 1.

Request Body

mapDataobjectoptional— Optional map configuration data
isPrivatebooleanoptional— If true, battle won't appear in public listings (default: false)

Example:

{
  "mapData": {
    "type": "forest",
    "size": 10
  },
  "isPrivate": true
}

Response

successboolean— Whether the battle was created
battleobject— Created battle summary
messagestring— Human-readable status message

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "battle": {
    "battleId": "a99958640027f6bc",
    "status": "pending",
    "currentTurn": 0,
    "isPrivate": true
  },
  "message": "Private battle created. Share the battleId with your opponent to join."
}

Error Responses

401Device authentication required
GET/api/battles/:idPublic

Get detailed information about a specific battle including current state.

Response

successboolean— Whether the request was successful
battleBattle— Full battle object with all fields

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "battle": {
    "battleId": "e0a5b571c0ddc493",
    "player1DeviceId": "a0dcb007...",
    "player2DeviceId": "f55c9b25...",
    "status": "active",
    "currentTurn": 3,
    "currentPlayerIndex": 1,
    "mapData": {
      "type": "forest"
    },
    "isPrivate": false,
    "createdAt": "2026-01-23T00:46:56.440Z",
    "updatedAt": "2026-01-23T01:15:22.100Z"
  }
}

Error Responses

404Battle not found
PATCH/api/battles/:idAuth Required

Join a pending battle as player 2. The battle status changes from "pending" to "active".

Response

successboolean— Whether joining was successful
battleBattle— Updated battle object
messagestring— Human-readable status message

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "battle": {
    "battleId": "e0a5b571c0ddc493",
    "status": "active",
    "currentTurn": 0
  },
  "message": "Successfully joined battle. You are player 2."
}

Error Responses

400Battle is not in pending status
401Device authentication required
404Battle not found
GET/api/mybattlesAuth Required

List all battles for the authenticated device. Auto-forfeits opponents who haven't moved in 7 days. Supports ?status= filter.

Request Body

statusstringoptional— Query param filter: pending, active, completed, abandoned

Example:

{
  "status": "active"
}

Response

successboolean— Whether the request was successful
battlesBattle[]— Array of battles where device is player1 or player2
battles[].winnerIdstring|null— Winner device ID (null if ongoing)
battles[].endReasonstring|null— How ended: victory, forfeit, draw
battles[].lastTurnAtstring|null— ISO timestamp of last turn
countnumber— Total number of battles returned

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "battles": [
    {
      "battleId": "e0a5b571c0ddc493",
      "status": "active",
      "winnerId": null,
      "endReason": null,
      "lastTurnAt": "2025-01-20T10:30:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "battleId": "a99958640027f6bc",
      "status": "completed",
      "winnerId": "abc123...",
      "endReason": "forfeit"
    }
  ],
  "count": 2
}

Error Responses

401Device authentication required
POST/api/turnsAuth Required

Submit a turn with actions. Only the current active player can submit. Turns are validated for proper sequencing.

Request Body

battleIdstringrequired— The battle to submit the turn for
actionsAction[]required— Array of actions (max 100). Must include end_turn action.
gameStateobjectoptional— Optional game state snapshot (max 50KB)

Example:

{
  "battleId": "e0a5b571c0ddc493",
  "actions": [
    {
      "type": "move",
      "unitId": "u1",
      "from": {
        "x": 1,
        "y": 2
      },
      "to": {
        "x": 3,
        "y": 2
      }
    },
    {
      "type": "attack",
      "unitId": "u1",
      "targetId": "enemy1"
    },
    {
      "type": "end_turn"
    }
  ],
  "gameState": {
    "units": [],
    "resources": 100
  }
}

Response

successboolean— Whether the turn was submitted
turnobject— Submitted turn summary
battleobject— Updated battle state
messagestring— Human-readable status message

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "turn": {
    "turnId": "abc123...",
    "turnNumber": 4,
    "isValid": true,
    "validationErrors": []
  },
  "battle": {
    "battleId": "e0a5b571c0ddc493",
    "currentTurn": 4,
    "currentPlayerIndex": 0,
    "status": "active"
  },
  "message": "Turn submitted successfully"
}

Error Responses

400Invalid request body or battle not active
401Device authentication required
403Not your turn or not a battle participant
409Turn already submitted (duplicate)
413Request payload too large
GET/api/turns?battleId=:idPublic

Get turn history for a specific battle.

Response

successboolean— Whether the request was successful
turnsTurn[]— Array of turn objects in order

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "turns": [
    {
      "turnId": "abc123...",
      "turnNumber": 1,
      "deviceId": "a0dcb007...",
      "actions": [],
      "isValid": true
    },
    {
      "turnId": "def456...",
      "turnNumber": 2,
      "deviceId": "f55c9b25...",
      "actions": [],
      "isValid": true
    }
  ]
}

Error Responses

400Battle ID is required
GET/api/statsAuth Required

Get player statistics for the authenticated device. Includes battle counts, win/loss record, and total turns submitted.

Response

successboolean— Whether the request was successful
statsobject— Player statistics object
stats.deviceIdstring— Device identifier
stats.displayNamestring— Device display name
stats.avatarstring— Bird avatar (BIRD1-BIRD12)
stats.memberSincestring— ISO date when device was registered
stats.totalBattlesnumber— Total battles participated in
stats.completedBattlesnumber— Battles that have ended
stats.activeBattlesnumber— Currently active battles
stats.pendingBattlesnumber— Battles waiting for opponent
stats.winsnumber— Total victories
stats.lossesnumber— Total defeats
stats.drawsnumber— Battles with no winner
stats.winRatestring— Win percentage (e.g., "66.7%")
stats.totalTurnsSubmittednumber— Total turns submitted across all battles

Example (200 OK):

{
  "success": true,
  "stats": {
    "deviceId": "a0dcb007051f88c0...",
    "displayName": "My Playdate",
    "avatar": "BIRD4",
    "memberSince": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000Z",
    "totalBattles": 15,
    "completedBattles": 12,
    "activeBattles": 2,
    "pendingBattles": 1,
    "wins": 8,
    "losses": 3,
    "draws": 1,
    "winRate": "66.7%",
    "totalTurnsSubmitted": 142
  }
}

Error Responses

401Device authentication required
500Server error

Data Types

Battle

battleId — Unique battle identifier

player1DeviceId — Device ID of player 1 (creator)

player2DeviceId — Device ID of player 2 (null if pending)

status — "pending" | "active" | "completed" | "abandoned"

currentTurn — Current turn number (0-indexed)

currentPlayerIndex — 0 for player1, 1 for player2

isPrivate — Whether battle is hidden from public listing

mapData — Custom map configuration object

Action

type — "move" | "attack" | "build" | "capture" | "wait" | "take_off" | "land" | "supply" | "end_turn"

unitId — Identifier of the unit performing action

from — Starting position { x, y }

to — Target position { x, y }

targetId — ID of target unit (for attacks)

data — Additional action-specific data

Turn

turnId — Unique turn identifier

battleId — Associated battle

deviceId — Device that submitted the turn

turnNumber — Sequential turn number

actions — Array of actions in this turn

isValid — Whether the turn passed validation

gameState — Snapshot of game state after turn

Bird Wars Async Battle Server
